DOC.brief_summary: The investigator study efficacy epidural sufentanil/ropivacaine analgesia labor primipara decrease perinatal complication analgesia labor .
DOC.detailed_description: A prospective study 120 full-term parturients receive labor analgesia randomly assign 2 group : 0.5Sufen group ( N=60 ) , 0.25Sufen group ( N=60 ) .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients regular prenatal examination outpatient clinic ; 2 . They 25 35 year age ) 3 . They gestational age ≥37 week < 42 week ; 4 . They estimate fetal weight ≥ 2,500 g < 4,200 g. history spinal surgery , platelet count ＜100×109 /L , coagulation disorder , sensorimotor disorder low extremity , leg pain , puncture point infection , heart disease history , pulmonary disease , liver renal function disorder history neuropsychiatry drug .
